mapper.select: SELECT * FROM qna WHERE replyNum > 0 AND replyTitle IS NOT NULL AND replyTitle != '' ORDER BY replyNum DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{amount}
select * from qna where email = #{email} order by replyNum asc
mapper.insert: insert into qna(replyTitle, replyContent, replyImg, replyPwd, email, replyCategory) values (#{replyTitle},#{replyContent},#{replyImg},#{replyPwd},#{email},#{replyCategory})
mapper.select: select replyPwd from qna where replyNum = #{replyNum}
